ceo_buyer.justification: Critical Resources’ Chairman, Robert Martin, commented;...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The Company has agreed to acquire 100% of the fully paid ordinary shares in Golden Plateau Pty Ltd...

currency.justification: $50,000 cash payment... (Currency is not explicitly stated but inferred as AUD due to ASX listings and project location).

cash_payments_raw.justification: Terms of the Acquisition include the following consideration payable to the Seller (i) $50,000 cash payment payable after completion...

share_payments_raw.justification: The total value of all share-based payments (initial + milestones) is summed: (ii) $250,000 in CRR shares... (iii) $25,000 in CRR shares... (iv) $25,000 in CRR shares...

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Not applicable as explicit cash and share payment values are provided (Priority 1).

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The number of shares is not fixed; it is based on a future VWAP calculation, so a specific number cannot be extracted.

issued_share_price.justification: The share price is variable based on a future 20-day VWAP, so a specific price cannot be extracted.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No specific drilling meterage is defined as a contractual commitment in the deal terms.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No specific monetary value is defined as a contractual commitment in the deal terms. A separate capital raise is mentioned to fund future exploration.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Ground mapping and sampling surveys with a view to delineate and design future drilling campaigns.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: ...expedite data processing, ground mapping and sampling surveys across its many antimony-gold prospects within its greater Halls Peak Project with a view to delineate and designing future drilling campaigns.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Amoco Antimony-Gold grid (“Amoco”) covers an area of approximately 1.7km2 in size...

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Amoco Antimony-Gold grid (“Amoco”) covers an area of approximately 1.7km2 in size...

resource_size_desc.justification: A resource size (3.154Mt...) is mentioned, but the text explicitly attributes it to a different project: '...as evidenced by the Larvotto Resources’ Hillgrove Gold-Antimony Project...'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Critical minerals exploration and project development company Critical Resources Limited ASX:CRR (“Critical Resources”, “CRR” or “the Company”) is pleased to announce...
